prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The text contains HTML tags, suggesting it is part of a webpage structure. It includes a search module, implying that the website likely has a search functionality to help users find content.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: HTML tags, webpage structure, search module, search functionality, content discovery
